flawed_nl_solution:
There were 125 seeds planted for each of the 4 colors of flower, so there were 125 * 4 = <<125*4=5000>>5000 flowers planted.
The fungus killed 25 red, 31 yellow, 30 orange, and 40 purple flowers, 45 + 61 + 30 + 40 = 176 flowers dead.
This leaves 5000 - 176 = <<5000-176=4824>>4824 flowers for the bouquets.
If the florist puts 9 flowers in each bouquet, he can make 4824 / 9 = <<4824/9=536>>536 bouquets this weekend.
#### 536

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
